nodes.text: Project Pandemonium was an operation that was launched by the Sith Lord Odion during the New Sith Wars, to discover the location of the Helm of Ieldis, an artifact created by the ancient Sith Lord Ieldis. The project came to a halt after Odion's operatives tracked the relic to the planet Sarrassia, outside of Odion's territories. However, in the aftermath of the collapse of the empire of Odion's rival Ayanos Bactra in 1032 BBY, Odion gained access to Sarrassia and he re-continued Project Pandemonium.
